params.prompt: In a contemporary, softly lit setting, the focus is on a young man seated comfortably in a modern armchair. He is dressed in a semi-casual yet stylish ensemble, consisting of a light lavender button-down shirt worn over a beige t-shirt, paired with beige trousers. His posture is upright and relaxed, indicating ease and engagement in conversation. His hands are gesturing animatedly, moving from an open, spread-out position near his body to clasping each other, then unfurling again, suggesting he is in the midst of a detailed and lively discussion. The background is a textured, neutral gray, providing a clean, distraction-free canvas that reinforces the subject's presence as the central protagonist. The scene conveys a calm and professional atmosphere, with subtle lighting accentuating the subject's facial expressions and gestures, enhancing the engagement and warmth of the interaction.
params.negative_prompt: 色调艳丽，过曝，静态，细节模糊不清，字幕，风格，作品，画作，画面，静止，整体发灰，最差质量，低质量，JPEG压缩残留，丑陋的，残缺的，多余的手指，画得不好的手部，画得不好的脸部，畸形的，毁容的，形态畸形的肢体，手指融合，静止不动的画面，杂乱的背景，三条腿，背景人很多，倒着走
